articles.author: Pranshu Verma
articles.title: India casts doubt as Trump says Modi pledged to stop buying Russian oil - The Washington Post
articles.description: President Donald Trump said Prime Minister Narendra Modi had promised that India would stop buying Russian oil. However, India said it was “not aware” Trump and Modi had spoken at all.
articles.content: NEW DELHI Indian officials said Thursday they were not aware of any conversation between President Donald Trump and Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday, appearing to contradict a claim by the A… [+106 chars]
